Summary Note:
Léa Ophélie Marchand and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Paris. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Léa Ophélie Marchand is a 36 year old Shipping Company Owner from France. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Léa Ophélie Marchand is currently divorced. She has 1 kid called Fournier.
Education Background:
Léa completed her secondary education at Lycée Fustel de Coulanges in 2008.
Léa completed her university studies at IUT de Rennes in 2011.
Additionally, she went on to study at ESSEC Business School until 2015.
Occupation History:
Léa Ophélie Marchand is a 36 year old Shipping Company Owner from France.
Léa Ophélie Marchand began her professional journey as a Ship Broker at Louis Dreyfus Armateurs in 2012, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Shipping Company Owner at Neptune Lines France in 2018, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 70000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She has flat located in Rouen, worth 1280000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns condo in Clermont-Ferrand worth 1080000 EUR.


Following the passing of her grandfather, a successful Real Estate Developer, she received an inheritance of 480000 EUR in 2017, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
